reviewText:
if your interested in Bakugan collect the first and second seasons

10/10
my son loves this show  dvd like new.
I got this DVD as a birthday gift for my son's Bakugan theme party.  He loves it so much that he's been watching it day and night.  Product arrived quickly and in perfect condition.

my son loves this movie but for a mother only having one tv it was forever long now we have three tvs and that movie is in my sons room next to his tv if you get the picture it is not to be in my dvd player lol it is great for the kids though i would buy others like this again
Easier to buy these then collect off cable. Getting them in order helps the series make more sense. Looking forward to getting the rest
For my son. He enjoys the robotic toys, games and movies. We have all the volumes as they come out. Thanks for the update on chapter battles.

My son and I saw this in the store yesterday and it begins with episode 27.  I was wondering if the previous six volumes cover the episodes prior to this DVD. It seems kind of odd to label it "Chapter One" and have it begin so far into the series. It seems misleading.
